I 100% feel this a lot of the time. I really only have one friend that I feel comfortable fully delving into my feelings with, and I still have trouble talking to them because I feel like I‚Äôm being a burden or a broken record. And when I do manage to type out a novel of why I feel shitty, I immediately feel bad for saying it all when it‚Äôs all said and done. On top of all of that, I feel guilty for my depression because I don‚Äôt feel like I ‚Äúdeserve‚Äù to be depressed, if that makes sense. I don‚Äôt necessarily have a bad life, like at all. There are certain aspects that I‚Äôm very unhappy with, but generally speaking my day to day living is mostly comfortable. Sometimes I feel shitty for no reason, or at least it feels like no reason. I have a lot going through my head and certain things tend to make me feel worse than others but I feel afraid that my friends and loved ones wouldn‚Äôt understand why I feel depressed. It‚Äôs weird. Like I feel like I have some valid reasons to feel the way I do but as a whole it feels like I shouldn‚Äôt be depressed. I know it‚Äôs irrational, but I just feel like no one would believe me or just say I‚Äôm overreacting. So yeah, I am with you on that one. It really sucks
